title: Jennifer Aniston dishes on what happened to Ross and Rachel after Friends
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jennifer Aniston has let the cat out of the bag - Ross and Rachel are on another break.

Taking to her new Instagram account, Jen, 50, set about answering some burning fan questions.

She sent the Internet into meltdown with a selfie alongside her Friends co-stars - Lisa Kudrow, Courtney Cox, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer.

When The Bachelor star Kaitlyn Bristowe posed the question of Jen's character Rachel Green's relationship with David's Ross Geller, Jen's answer has fans shaking.

Ross and Rachel's on-off romance has become the stuff of pop culture legend, with the tenth and final series ending in a heartwarming reunion.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: NBC via Getty Images)

Jen replied to Kaitlyn: "well we're on a break."

While the blond beauty may have been larking about, her answer has fans in a tizzy.

During a controversial storyline early in the show's run, Ross cheated on Rachel because the two were "on a break" - and that line would go on to ruin various future attempts at reconciliation.

(Image: Instagram)

Despite the selfie, Jen's dashed fans' hopes of an actual on-screen reunion by insisting that a reboot wouldn't be as good.

She told the Howerd Stern Show: "We all miss it every day. I would be nothing without it...if there's a reboot of the show, it won't be as good as what it was, so why do it? It would ruin it."

She's got her eyes fixed on new project The Morning Show, which she stars in alongside pal (and Friends cameo-maker) Reese Witherspoon.

Jen's especially excited about her character, who seems worlds away from perfect cheerleader type Rachel.

Her character Alex is set to be a vulnerable, struggling, troubled type in the comedy-drama.
description: The Rachel Green actress let slip on her new Instagram account that things might not be so great for everyone's favourite TV couple
